title: Creamy Avocado Chicken Salad Recipe
description: This refreshing avocado chicken salad comes together quickly by blending cooked chicken, avocado, sour cream, black pepper, garlic, and lime juice.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Chicken Salad Recipes Creamy Avocado Chicken Salad 4.6 (19) 14 Reviews 5 Photos This simple avocado chicken salad is smooth, creamy, and full of flavor! It's hard to believe how quickly it comes together. Serve on crackers or as a sandwich or wrap. Submitted by SunnyDaysNora Updated on June 8, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 5 5 5 5 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 2 cooked chicken breast halves, diced 1 ripe avocado, sliced ½ cup sour cream 1 ½ teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste 1 teaspoon lime juice ½ teaspoon garlic powder ½ teaspoon onion powder ¼ teaspoon salt Directions Place chicken in a food processor; process until finely chopped. Add avocado, sour cream, black pepper, lime juice, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt; blend until smooth (or the consistency you desire). I Made It Print 47 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 217 Calories 15g Fat 7g Carbs 15g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 217 % Daily Value * Total Fat 15g 19% Saturated Fat 5g 27% Cholesterol 49mg 16% Sodium 197mg 9% Total Carbohydrate 7g 2% Dietary Fiber 4g 13% Total Sugars 1g Protein 15g 31% Vitamin C 6mg 7% Calcium 51mg 4% Iron 1mg 6% Potassium 413mg 9% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Creamy Avocado Chicken Salad 01 of 05 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 05 Photo by  Tammy Lynn 12/13/2017 This is good. I really liked the lime and avocado flavor with the chicken. I didn't add all the pepper--probably just a total of 1/4 t. I used canned chicken, so I didn't puree any of it--just stirred it all around until creamy, but with a few chunks. I took some out for myself, and then I added diced red onion because my husband has to have raw onion in any chicken salad. I also added a few dashes of hot sauce to his. 03 of 05 Photo by  Aja 08/05/2014 Calling all avocado lovers! This particular recipe was extremely quick and easy. Very smooth and creamy! This is a great alternative to using mayo in my chicken salad all of the time. The sour cream adds just the right amount of acidity along with the lime. This recipe did call for blending the chicken with the avocado, but I did see the review mentioning that it came out pasty. I have made it with the chicken blended and while I do not mind it, I really enjoy chunks of chicken in my salad, so I opted this time to add it after I have blended all of the other ingredients. I served it along with some brioche sliders and voila! Perfect for a group of friends too. Will continue to make this again and again! 04 of 05 Photo by  Suzie 07/01/2014 05 of 05 Photo by  SunnyDaysNora 04/11/2014 1 You’ll Also Love Chicken, Avocado and Mango Salad 94 Ratings 6 Awesome Avocado Chicken Salad Recipes Avocado Chicken Salad 3 Ratings Chicken Salad Avocado 3 Ratings Julie's Chicken Salad 44 Ratings Avocado Ranch Chicken Salad 10 Ratings Chicken Bacon Ranch Salad 1 Rating Grilled Chicken Salad with Seasonal Fruit 267 Ratings Warm and Limey Chicken Salad 30 Ratings Grilled Chicken, Peach, and Arugula Salad 40 Ratings Chicken Salad with Apples, Grapes, and Walnuts 95 Ratings Dijon Chicken Salad 68 Ratings Rachel's Cranberry Chicken Salad 233 Ratings Strawberry Chicken Salad 28 Ratings Minty Peach Chicken Salad 3 Ratings Asian Chicken Salad Cups 4 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: SunnyDaysNora
instructions: Place chicken in a food processor; process until finely chopped. Add avocado, sour cream, black pepper, lime juice, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt; blend until smooth (or the consistency you desire).
